data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during REGULUS cruise from Spithead to St. Georges Bermuda started at 1814-04-08
Ship: Regulus (Store Ship), Voyage: Spithead - St Georges Bermuda, 1st Observer: Robert Ramsay (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: EX 5TH RATE 44G 879BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
